p: In addition, due to the aflatoxins and the chemicals are frequently perceived to present side effects to human health, it is necessarily important to develop ways of reducing their contamination by other non-chemical alternatives. Thus, natural compounds active formulations have become increasingly more important as a means to deliver the agricultural commodities to the consumer, in safe conditions. On this, there are various recognized plant and animal biodegradable derivatives whose antimicrobial function has been extensively reported ( Ramos-García et al., 2010).
